ygData.msgSnippet: Eh heh you forget the Infecticons and Vile Force, I think they are the only factions still whole. Of course the Vile Force is rarely scene, they just lurk

Eh heh you forget the Infecticons and Vile Force, I think they are the only 
factions still whole. Of course the Vile Force is rarely scene, they just 
lurk about in the shadows. Ditto for the infecticons, except the Infecticons 
tend to cause great destruction when scene.

--part1_143.8246fad.297c6038_boundary
